mapper.update: update member set nickname=#{nickname}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, scNumF=#{scNumF}, scNumL=#{scNumL} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
select count(*) from member where nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.update: update member inner join (select movieqId, sum(score) mvs from movies group by movieqId) as mv set movieScore = mv.mvs where movieqId = nickname
update member inner join (select musicqId, sum(score) mss from musics group by musicqId) as ms set musicScore = ms.mss where musicqId = nickname
update member set totalScore = movieScore + musicScore
mapper.select: select email, nickname, name, phoneNumber, scNumF, scNumL, adminRight from member order by adminRight desc
select nickname,movieScore,musicScore,totalScore from member order by ${sortName} desc
